external_games.name: Stunt Flyer: Hero of the Skies

name: Stunt Flyer: Hero of the Skies
summary:
Prepare for the greatest and most challenging flight adventure on Nintendos Wii platform. Master the skies of Gloster Island as you take control of a daring pilot
in Stunt Flyer - Heroes of the Skies, a colorful, action flight game designed to show the fun of flying to kids of all ages. Soar through and around three whimsical islands and complete 40 exciting missions that include sky racing, stunt flying, shooting targets, finding hidden treasures and much more. Flight skills are rewarded with unlockable plane skins and new flying machines including jet planes and UFOs! Zip through floating rings, swoop under bridges, skim across the water, and barrel roll through the valley in a bid to become Gloster Island’s resident Sky Captain!
